QueryResult.text: SELECT S.ID SESSION_ID, S.TOKEN TOKEN, U.ID, U.USER_NAME, U.PWD, U.PWD_REQUIRED, U.USER_STATUS_ID, U.OBS_ID, U.DESCRIPTION, U.FIRST_NAME, U.MIDDLE_NAME, U.LAST_NAME, U.EMAIL_ADDRESS, U.PHOTO_FILE, U.LOCALE, U.TIMEZONE, U.LANGUAGE_ID, U.COUNTRY_ID, U.CURRENCY_CODE, U.LOGIN_COUNT, U.BAD_LOGIN_COUNT, U.LAST_LOGGED_IN_DATE, U.LAST_PWD_CHANGE, U.FORCE_PWD_CHANGE, U.CREATED_DATE, U.CREATED_BY, U.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, U.LAST_UPDATED_BY, U.FULL_NAME, U.COMPANY_ID, U.IS_LDAP, U.HOME_URL, U.NAV_STATE, U.SCREEN_READER_OPT, U.HIGH_CONTRAST_UI, U.TRACE_LEVEL, U.USER_UID FROM CMN_SESSIONS S, CMN_SEC_USERS U WHERE U.ID = S.USER_ID
